howItWorks.title: How It
howItWorks.description: Get your professional portfolio online in 4 simple steps

step1.title: Choose Your Template
step1.description: Select from our collection of stunning, professionally designed templates tailored for photographers.

step2.title: Customize Everything
step2.description: Make it yours with our intuitive drag-and-drop editor. No coding skills required.

step3.title: Launch Your Site
step3.description: Go live in minutes with your custom domain or our free subdomain. It's that simple.

step4.title: Grow Your Business
step4.description: Start selling your work, connect with clients, and watch your photography business thrive.
